izzy.classification.bic¶

izzy.classification.bic(log_likelihood, degrees_of_freedom, num_samples)[source]¶

Compute the Bayesian Information Criteria (BIC)

This function penalizes the log likelihood \(L\) by the degrees of freedom \(D\) and the number of samples \(N\). Specifically, we compute,

\[BIC = -2L + Dln(N)\]
Parameters

  • log_likelihood (int or float) – Log likelihood

  • degrees_of_freedom (int or float) – Degrees of freedom

  • num_samples (integer) – Number of observations

Returns

BIC

Return type

float
